title: 'BEX' slanted sans caps
content:
Can you tell me what the font is in the attached logo GIF? I only have the 3 letters available and really only need these 3 letters....for now! If you can identify the typeface for the entire set, that would be even better!!

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BEX.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202022759/http:/typophile.com/files/BEXLogo250x140.gif) | 972 bytes |
author: randy0242

comments.content: This looks like a plain sans serif like Helvetica to me. Why do you specifically need this face; or in other words what's so special about those three characters?
